Windlord:

Windlord shoked and typed more buttons and sent and uncoded 
message"Windlord to Maximals"said the male "We need support in this 
place" he explained the situation and that two pods was lost"I'm 
leading the wound bots to base, come quickly to this coordinates, 
please... a bot here is taking care of ship's suplies and he's alone"

Windlord looked to Raven and said "If Predacons come in a big number 
use this "He gave a Rave a bomb" you can use it to blow up your ship 
remains and follow my signal... The best is that you lost your 
equipments than your life.... and I don't like other funeral"

Windlord took in arms Sabre and  motioned WingRazor to follow him. 
He took off and flew at high speed towards Maximal's base.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "dishpanhandninja" <foxmanroar1@a...> 
wrote:
> WingRazor shook her head. "I better stay here, all of our 
equipement 
> is here... we can't let it fall in the wrong hands..."
> 
> "I'll stay." Rave smiled pulling out his blasters." You two save 
our 
> buds and i'll play wack a mole with the preds if they think they 
can 
> come in here."
> 
> Wing nodded... "Alright... Waith here one second friend, i'll get 
> Sabre. She entered the ship and soon emerged with Sabre's limp 
form 
> in her arms...
